tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
  equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  serial_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_records TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   serial_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
   purchase_date DATE,
   maintenance_records JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
   log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INTEGER REFERENCES equipment_inventory(id),
   maintenance_date DATE,
   technician_name VARCHAR(100),
   maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE equipment (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), serial_number VARCHAR(50), purchase_date DATE, maintenance_record TEXT);
CREATE TABLE manufacturers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(id), maintenance_date DATE, technician_name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE warranties (id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(id), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, company_name VARCHAR(255));
